dataformat.name: xstreamJson
dataformat.title: JSON XStream
dataformat.description: Marshal POJOs to JSON and back using XStream
dataformat.label: dataformat,transformation,json

prettyPrint.description: To enable pretty printing output nicely formatted. Is by default false.

dropRootNode.label: advanced
dropRootNode.description: Whether XStream will drop the root node in the generated JSon. You may want to enable this when using POJOs; as then the written object will include the class name as root node, which is often not intended to be written in the JSON output.

contentTypeHeader.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML, or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSON
